Texto: 
not available
frontal and lateral views of the wrist show a dorsal displacement of the distal radius epiphysis with respect to the metaphysis.  the misalignment becomes more evident when compared to the appropriately located epiphysis on the post-reduction lateral view.
salter-harris type 1 fracture, salter and harris
7 yo female complains of severe wrist pain.
